Class UserMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.UserMapper

  • public class UserMapper
extends Object
    The class UserMapper handels all the querries to the databse about the user.
    Author:
    Bo Henriksen

    • Method Detail

      • getUserData

        public User getUserData(String username)
                 throws SQLException
        This method gets all the data that is in the database for a user.
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user that is going to find data about.
        Returns:
        a user object with information about the user.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if an sql error occur.

      • addUser

        public int addUser(User u)
            throws Exception
        Her tilføjes en bruger i databasen, når vedkommende har intastet bruger oplysninger på registration.jsp siden og trykket submit.
        Parameters:
        u - is the user that is going to be added to the database.
        Returns:
        id
        Throws:
        Exception - if an sql error occur.

      • godkendBruger

        public boolean godkendBruger(User loginUser)
        Her godkendes en bruger, om vedkommende findes i databasen og om passwordet er korrekt.
        Parameters:
        loginUser - is the name of the user that is tring to login.
        Returns:
        true if there is a next record and false if there is'nt.

      • godkendAdmin

        public boolean godkendAdmin(Admin adminLogin)
        Tjekker om brugeren der logger ind, er Admin eller ej.
        Parameters:
        adminLogin - the name of the admin that is tring to login.
        Returns:
        true if there is a next record in resultset and false if there is'nt.

      • getAdminData

        public Admin getAdminData(String adminUsername)
                   throws SQLException
        Her fås det data om admin brugeren.
        Parameters:
        adminUsername - is the admin data your looking for.
        Returns:
        an object with admin userdata.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if an sql error occur.

      • changeUserBalance

        public void changeUserBalance(String username,
                              double b)
                       throws Exception
        Her ændres en brugers kontantbeholdning, her kaldet UserBalance.
        Parameters:
        username - the username which balance is going to be changed.
        b - the amount that is going to be changed to.
        Throws:
        Exception - if an sql error occur.
